content.text: Hey! I'm a dog lover as well. I just got a new puppy!
Oh my goodness, that's wonderful! I love puppies. What breed is it?
It's a golden retriever! He's only a few months old.
How precious! I love goldens. They're the sweetest dogs.
Me too! I've always wanted one.
I'm so happy for you! I'm sure you'll have lots of fun with him.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it. I'm hoping to train him to be a therapy dog.
That's amazing! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Thanks, I appreciate it! Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Mittens. She's a little old lady now, but she's still the best friend I could ask for.
Aww, that's sweet! I love cats too.
I'm more of a dog person, but I do love cats.
It sounds like you have a great family.
I do! I'm really lucky to have them.
